channel.title: How do you make a item only usable to a admin
channel.description: ive made changes to weps and i dont want players to use them cause they would be able to pk very easy so how do i make the usable to only admins or only getable by admins :)

item.title: How do you make a item only usable to a admin
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

0.o:

… -.- steph do u know what the boolean process is lol

Thats the thing… No.

item.source: How do you make a item only usable to a admin

item.title: How do you make a item only usable to a admin
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

i just made a command that should ban u unless ur playerrights are 3 (owner) for having the item[br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2007, 08:42:05 PM[/size][hr]ok i tested it and it works.u want it? it makes it were if they get an item and try to equip the item they get baned, i used bronze dagger for example, if u want i can make it just delete the item :P[br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2007, 08:48:52 PM[/size][hr]ok, this will make it delete the item -

if (ItemName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bronze dagger") && (playerRights >= 2)) { return 1; } else { sendMessage("This item is for admins only!"); deleteItem(1205, getItemSlot(1205), 1); }

To add it, search ur client.java for

ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) {

and add right under it, change the - Bronze - to the first part of the item u want, then change the item number to the item number u want. Only admins and owners can u it, if u want to make owner only make the >= 2 to == 3 or if u want mods admins and owners just make the 2 a 1[br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2007, 08:53:58 PM[/size][hr]if (ItemName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bronze dagger") && (playerRights >= 2)) { return 1; } else { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

Bans instead of deleting item. also the return 1; is the level needed to wield the item, change the 1 to whatever u want.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make a item only usable to a admin
item.dc:creator: @Threatening Threatening
item.description:
@Threatening wrote:

[quote=“Stilles, post:3, topic:109468”]Haha, you could make a bronze dagger be like 850 strength and have it’s max hit top out maybe at 90 . That would be evil…
[hr]
Ah! Wait, i got an idea. You could make sure the item isn’t in any shop, then make it untradeable. If someone pk’s it, they wouldn’t get it! If you wanted to give it to someone, just edit their bank and pop a few thousand in there.[/quote]
I think that my way would be a little more noob proof? because even if a noob has it and puts it on…they should die…

Read full topic
